product_name: lucy Double Time Workout Bra - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The best workouts are usually the toughest, so keep them fun with the colorful Double Time Workout sports bra from lucy. High-impact support keeps everything in place while you're on the move. Stretch nylon fabric with mesh lining moves moisture away from skin to keep you dry and comfortable during your workout. Compression-style support minimizes bounce; racerback ensures complete freedom of motion. Closeout.
short_description: The best workouts are usually the toughest, so keep them fun with the colorful Double Time Workout sports bra from lucy. High-impact support keeps everything in place while you're on the move.
